property.name: Abilities
property.value:
Aymeric doesn't receive damage that is less than his power.
When Aymeric attacks, all the Forwards other than Aymeric you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

Knight's Arrow [S] [1 Water CP]: Choose 2 Forwards. Dull the first Forward and activate the other.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Sahagin also becomes a Forward with 6000 power and 'When Sahagin attacks, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: When Shuyin enters the field, choose 1 Forward with a power inferior to Shuyin's. You gain control of this Forward until the end of the turn.

property.value: Standard Unit

property.name: Abilities
property.value: [Dull, put Summoner into the Break Zone]: Cast a Summon from your hand. The cost required to cast is reduced by 2 (it cannot become 0).

property.name: Job
property.value: Standard Unit

property.name: Abilities
property.value: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the damage dealt to it is reduced by 2000 instead.

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
For each Backup you control, Scott gains +1000 power.
If you control [Card Name (Hilda)], Scott and the [Card Name (Gordon)] you control gain Brave.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: [1 Water CP, 1 CP, put Dracobaltian into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: EX BURST: Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Job
property.value: Standard Unit

property.name: Abilities
property.value: [Dull]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Backup, add it to your hand. If it is not a Backup, put it into the Break Zone.

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
If you control [Card Name (Leo)], the cost required to play Chime onto the field is reduced by 2.
When Chime enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. You may return 1 Forward you control to its owner's hand. If you do so, return the chosen Forward to its owner's hand.

property.name: Job
property.value: Standard Unit

property.name: Abilities
property.value: If Paladin is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 4000 instead.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: EX BURST: When Pieuje enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Prince)] and add it to your hand.

property.value: SearchForCard_Search Deck for Prince|Player_Deck_Job,=,Prince

property.name: Abilities
property.value: When Hilda enters the field, draw 1 card for each Forward you control. You can only draw up to 4 cards with this ability.

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
When Minwu enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Summon among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
When Minwu attacks, you may cast 1 Summon of cost 4 or less from your hand without paying the cost.

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
When Yuna enters the field, play 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward from your hand onto the field or search for 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward other than [Card Name (Yuna)] and add it to your hand.
[1 CP, remove 3 Summons in the Break Zone from the game]: Choose 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Category
property.value: MB ● VII

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
Select 1 of the 3 following actions.
'Choose 1 Forward. Return it to its owner's hand.'
'Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.'
'During this turn, the Forwards you control don't receive any damage from Summons.'

property.name: Job
property.value: The First Brood

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
When Hraesvelgr enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions.
'Skip your opponent's Attack Phase in their next turn. Remove the top 5 cards of your deck from the game.'
'Choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.'
'Remove all the cards in your opponent's Break Zone from the game.'

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
Materia can be played onto the field even if you control other Light Characters.
You can play 2 or more Light Characters onto the field.
When Materia enters the field, you may search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand.
